甘薯提取乳房缓慢和肺癌生长，研究发现研究人员发现，来自红薯叶和茎的甲醇提取物可显着抑制乳腺癌和肺癌细胞的生长，有些作用与他莫昔芬相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/sweet-potato-extracts-slow-breast-breast-breast-and-cancer---------------------------cancer----------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/sweet-potato-extracts-slow-breast-breast-breast-and-cancer-cancer----------------------and-cancer------------finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0A5BC9F2-D4D2-4E97-A1EF-2828B04BCF7C Sun, 02 Mar 2025 20:02:00 -0500 Sweet potato extracts slow breast and lung cancer growth, study finds
